message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for a bit closer to my original asking price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $12,750? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.
